Question: Axelera AI CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Axelera AI

Product: Metis AI Platform

- YOLO performance for edge AI video analytics
- Integrates YOLO (You Only Look Once) neural networks for edge AI computer vision applications
- Offers edge AI-native hardware and software solutions
- Provides object detection video analytics pipeline running at 480 frames per second
- Entire platform set to launch in mid-2024, offering performance of up to 800 frames per second
- Offers energy efficiency and cost savings 4-5 times greater than GPU-based inference models
- Recognized as a CES 2024 Innovation Awards Honoree
Summary_cn:
Axelera AI

产品：Metis AI平台

- 边缘AI视频分析的YOLO性能
- 集成YOLO（You Only Look Once）神经网络，用于边缘AI计算机视觉应用
- 提供边缘AI原生硬件和软件解决方案
- 提供在每秒480帧运行的对象检测视频分析流水线
- 整个平台计划于2024年中旬推出，性能高达每秒800帧
- 提供比基于GPU推理模型节能和节约成本高4-5倍的效率
- 被认定为2024年CES创新奖的荣誉获奖者
